alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL HARDING, NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Nara Visa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nara Visa and Amistad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Motorists can expect brief but sudden changes in visibility and ponding of water on highways as storms move through the area.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Quay County; Union County
